Package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context

Selection Context Access This package contains classes to access data of the current context.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IContext
    This is the public interface to set and query a selection context.
    IContextChangedListener
    This is the public listener interface to get notified about context changes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractContext
    This is a convenient base class for IContext that represent the current selection/state of the tool.
    ContextManager
    This class manages the availabe selection contexts.
    ECUConfigContext
    This class manages the selection context for the ECU configuration project.
    ModuleConfigContext
    This class manages the selection context for the module configuration.
    SystemConfigContext
    This class manages the selection context for project with a system model .

Package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context Description

Selection Context Access

This package contains classes to access data of the current context. Context in this term means that data of the current user selection is provided. Therefore it can be queried which project or module is currently selected and some additional information important for the current environment

The context can be used for restricting the visibility of GuidedConfiguration Triggers and Wizards.

The core classes to context handling are:

  • IContext: The interface for all contexts
  • AbstractContext: An abstract implementation of IContext
  • ContextManager: Manages all available contexts and notifies about context changes
  • IContextChangedListener: The listener interface for all contexts. Instances of this interface can be registered at ContextManager
  • ECUConfigContext: The context of the currently selected ECU Configuration project.
  • ModuleConfigContext: The context of the currently selected module configuration.
